description:
Redesigned from the ground up, this easy-swinging tool is honed for technical ice and mixed routes. The 3-D hydroformed shaft extends through the grip for enhanced rigidity and wicked-solid sticks. The adjustable FlickLock pommel operates as a secondary grip position for low-angle terrain.

  • Modular stainless steel head, uses 2-screw design to easily change picks, hammers and adzes
  • Shaft is hydroformed for increased stiffness and reduced weight
  • Dual-density grip has a non-slip texture
  • Titan T-rated pick for added durability
  • Adjustable FlickLock pommel for switching up your hand position
name: Black Diamond Viper Hammer Ice Tool
